title: Beto O' Rourke on Guns, The Border Crisis and Personal Liberties Under Attack In Texas
description:
On today's ZBT we've got 3 Rounds in the magazine and they are brought to your by WhistlePig! Round 1: The Army senior leaders want troops to stop wasting time on silly training that army senior leaders require of all soldiers. Round 2: Beto O’Rouke is running for governor of Texas. He tells me how he’d improve my state or if I’ll have to move. Round 3: Lots of potty mouths join the military. One unit has come up with a way to stop all the naughty talk.
